title: [Placements] Eligibility for placements
content: Do companies put a bar on 10th and 12th marks? I mean what's the minimum criteria they put? If at all they do? Tier 1s?

comments.body: There are companies ,infact significant number of em including t1 t2 and t3 that keep cap on 10th and 12th marks..,it depends..some(or infact a significant number) keep 70 and very few keep 80 but 60 is the majority iâ€™d say
Alr, one of my friend got rejected by JPMC even after clearing OA and HR round turns out they had set a cap for 90% in 10th n 12th in his clg.. so I was curious about it
Ohh shit that fckng sucks mann,but 90% are very rare tbh
Yeah, I mean he had 2 DP, hard questions and other a question related to graph theory all that of effort just to be kicked out like this feels paranoid
There was this company called schneider electric(only for CS students),even they have put 90% in 10th and 12th as criteria
